name: Daryabadi
text: Sad. By the Qur'an full of admonition.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily those who disbelieve are in vainglory and shism.

name: Daryabadi
text: How many a generation have We destroyed afore them, and they cried when there was not time of fleeing.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they marvel that there should come Unto them a warner from among themselves. And the infidels say: this is a magician and a liar!

name: Daryabadi
text: Maketh he the gods One God? Verily that is a thing astounding!

name: Daryabadi
text: The chiefs among them departed saying: go, and persevere in your gods; verily this is a thing designed.

name: Daryabadi
text: We heard not thereof in the later faith; this is naught but an invention.

name: Daryabadi
text: Hath Unto him the admonition been sent down from amongst us! Yea! they are in doubt concerning My admonition. Yea! they have not yet tasted My torment.

name: Daryabadi
text: Or, are with them the treasures of the mercy of thy Lord, the Bestower?

name: Daryabadi
text: Or, is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and that which is in-between the twain? If so, let them ascend by steps.

name: Daryabadi
text: Here there is a host of the confederates only to be defeated.

name: Daryabadi
text: Before them there have belied the people of Nuh and the 'Aad, and Fir'awn the owner of the stakes.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the Thamud, and the people of Lut, and the dwellers of the wood; these were the confederates.

name: Daryabadi
text: There was not one but belied the apostles, wherefore justified was My wrath.

name: Daryabadi
text: And these wait but for one shout, wherefrom there will be no deferment.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they say: our Lord! hasten our portion unto us before the Day of Reckoning

name: Daryabadi
text: Bear thou with that which they say, and remember Our bondman, Da-ud, endured with strength; verily he was oft-returning onto Us.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We so subjected the mountains that they should hallow Us with him at nightfall and sunrise.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the birds also, gathering all oft-returning onto Him on his account.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We made his dominion strong and vouchsafed him wisdom and decisive speech.

name: Daryabadi
text: And hath the tidings of the contending parties reached thee, when they walled the apartment?

name: Daryabadi
text: When they went in unto Da-ud, he was frightened at them. They said: fear not we are two contending parties; one of us hath oppressed the other, so judge between us with truth, and be not iniquitious, and guide us unto the even path.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily this my brother hath nine and ninety ewes while I have one ewe; and he saith: entrust it to me, and he hath prevailed upon me in speech.

name: Daryabadi
text: Da-ud said: assuredly he hath wronged thee in demanding thine ewe in addition to his ewes, and verily many of the partners oppress each other save such as believe and work righteous works, and few are they. And Da-ud imagined that We had tried him; so he asked forgiveness of his Lord, and he fell down bowing and turned in penitence.

name: Daryabadi
text: So We forgave him that; and verily for him is an approach with us, and a happy retreat.

name: Daryabadi
text: O Da-ud! verily We have appointed thee a vicegerent in the earth, so judge between mankind with truth, and follow not desire, lest it cause thee to err from the path of Allah. Verily those who err from the path of Allah - Unto them shall be a severe torment, for they forgat the Day of Reckoning.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have not created the heaven and the earth and whatsoever is in-between the twain in vain." That is the opinion of those who disbelieve. And woe Unto those who disbelieve the Fire."

name: Daryabadi
text: Shall We make those who believe and work righteous works I i ke Unto the corrupters in the earth; Or Shall We make the God-fearing like Unto the wicked!

name: Daryabadi
text: This is a Book We have sent down Unto thee, blest, that they may ponder the revelations thereof, and that there may be admonished men of understanding.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We vouchsafed Unto Da-ud Sulaiman. How excellent a bondman! j Verily he was oft-returning.'

name: Daryabadi
text: Recall what time there were presented Unto him, at eventide, s coursers swift-footed.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: verily I have loved the love of earthly good above the remembrance of my Lord until the sun hath disappeared behind the veil.

name: Daryabadi
text: Bring them back Unto me; and he set about slashing their legs and necks.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We tried Sulaiman, and set upon his throne a mere body. Thereafter he was penitent.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: my Lord! forgive me, and bestow on me a dominion which no one may obtain beside me: verily Thou! Thou art the Bestower.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We subjected to him the wind: it ran gently by his command withersoever he directed.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We subjected to him the evil ones: every builder and diver.

name: Daryabadi
text: And others bound in fetters.

name: Daryabadi
text: This is Our gift, SO bestow thou or withhold, without rendering an account.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily for him is an approach with us, and a happy end.

name: Daryabadi
text: And remember thou Our bondman Ayyub, what time he cried Unto his Lord: verily the Satan hath touched me with affliction and suffering.

name: Daryabadi
text: Stamp the ground with thy foot. yonder is water to wash in, cool, and water to drink.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We bestowed on him his household and along with them the like thereof, out of mercy from us, and a remembrance Unto men of understanding.

name: Daryabadi
text: And take in thine hand a handful of twigs, and strike therewith, and break not thine oath. Verily We! We found him patient. How excellent a bondman! Verily he was oft-returning.

name: Daryabadi
text: And remember thou Our bond men, Ibrahim and Is-haq and Ya'qub. owners of might ana insight.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! We distinguished them with a distinct quality: the remembrance of the Abode.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily they are with us of the elect of the excellent ones

name: Daryabadi
text: And remember Isma'il and Al-Yas'a and Zul-kifl: all of the excellent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: This is an admonition, and verily for the God-feoring is a happy retreat:

name: Daryabadi
text: Gardens Everlasting, whereof the portals remain opened for them.

name: Daryabadi
text: Therein they will recline; therein they will call for plenteous fruit and drink.

name: Daryabadi
text: And with them will be virgins of refraining looks and of equal age.

name: Daryabadi
text: This it is that ye are promised for the Day of Reckoning.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily this is Our provision: there will be no ceasing thereof.

name: Daryabadi
text: This: and verily for the exorbitant there shall be an evil retreat:

name: Daryabadi
text: Hell, wherein they roast: a wretched couch.

name: Daryabadi
text: This - let them taste it: scalding water and corruption.

name: Daryabadi
text: And other torments, like thereof, conjoined.

name: Daryabadi
text: This is a crowd rushing in along with you; no welcome for them; verily they are to roast in the Fire.

name: Daryabadi
text: They will say nay! it is ye, for whom there is no welcome: it is ye who have brought it upon us. Evil shall be the resting-place.

name: Daryabadi
text: They Will say: our Lord! whosever hath brought this upon us, - Unto him increase doubly the torment of the Fire.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they will Say: what aileth us that we behold not men whom we were wont to count among the evil ones?

name: Daryabadi
text: Took we them so unjustly for a butt of mockery, or are they deluding our eyes?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily this is the very truth: the wrangling of the fellows of the Fire!

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou: I am but warner, and there is no god but Allah, the One, the Subduer.

name: Daryabadi
text: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatsoever is in- between the twain, the Mighty, the Forgiver.

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou: it is a tiding mighty.

name: Daryabadi
text: Ye are therefrom averting.

name: Daryabadi
text: I had no knowledge of the chiefs on high when they disputed;

name: Daryabadi
text: Naught is revealed Unto me except that I am a warner manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: Recall what time thy Lord said Unto the angels: verily I am about to create a human being from clay;

name: Daryabadi
text: Then when I have formed him and breathed into him of My spirit, fall down before him prostrate.

name: Daryabadi
text: The angels prostrated themselves, all of them.

name: Daryabadi
text: Not so lblis. He grew stiffnecked and became of the infidels.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah said: O Iblis! what preventeth thee from prostrating thyself before that which have created with both my hands? Becomest thou stiff-necked, or art thou of the exalted ones?

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: I am better than he: me Thou hast created of fire, and him Thou hast created of clay.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah said: get thee forth therefrom verify thou art driven away.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily My curse shall be on thee till the Day of Requital,

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: my Lord! respite me till the Day whereon they are raised up.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah said: verily, thou art of those respited.

name: Daryabadi
text: Until the Day of the time appointed.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: by Thy majesty, then, I shall surely seduce them, all.

name: Daryabadi
text: Save Thy bondmen among them Sincere.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah said: the truth is, and it is the truth that I speak, -

name: Daryabadi
text: That I shall fill Hell with thee and such of them as shall follow thee, all together.

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou: ask of you for it no hire, nor am I of the affecters.

name: Daryabadi
text: It is naught but an admonition Unto the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: And ye shall surely come to know the truth thereof after a season.
